summary: The No Wrong Door for Veterans Act (HR 1969) amends and reauthorizes the Staff Sergeant Parker Gordon Fox Suicide Prevention Grant Program. The bill modifies grant amounts, clarifies eligible entities, and mandates briefings for local VAMCs. It extends the program's duration to September 30, 2028, and includes provisions for emergent suicide care. The bill also reauthorizes funding for fiscal years 2026-2028 and specifies the use of a Secretary-selected screening protocol. The core focus is on improving veterans' access to mental health services and suicide prevention.
